annotations.description: All in all that was an entertaining 90 minutes of football thanks to some decent attacking play. The home side dominated this game. The home team made a lot of passes and attempted to maintain possession, while the away side made defence their highest priority.

The keeper doesn't have to worry about this one. Cosmin Moti (Ludogorets) sacrificed accuracy for power, and thus his attempt went well over the bar.

It was a good decision to watch today's encounter. There has already been more to see prior to the half time break than there is in most games during the full 90 minutes. During the first half the home team held the upper hand and were much more precise and effective. The tactic of the home side is slow build up play, while the away team's main priority is a flawless defence.
